Midsomer Murders

(a Titles &
Air Dates Guide)

by TVmaze

Last updated:
Mon, 12 Oct 2015 -1:00
aired from: Mar 1997
to: ___ ____
current show		 81+ eps ITV1 (UK) 120 min drama
  • regulars:
  • John Nettles as Detective Chief Inspector Tom Barnaby [ Episodes 1 - 81 ]
  • Daniel Casey as Detective Sergeant Gavin Troy [ Episodes 1 - 29]
  • John Hopkins as Detective Sergeant Dan Scott [ Episodes 30 - 43 ]
  • Jason Hughes as Detective Constable Ben Jones [ Episodes 44 - ]
  • recurring characters:
  • Jane Wymark as Joyce Barnaby
  • Laura Howard as Cully Barnaby
  • Barry Jackson as Dr George Bullard
  • Neil Conrich as PC Angel
  • Kirsty Dillon as WPC Gail Stephens
  • crew:
  • Brian True-May, producer
  • Betty Willingale, producer
  • Peter Cregeen, producer [ Episode 10 ]
  • Ian Strachan, line producer, and co-producer [ Episode 24 ]
  • Delia Fine, executive producer for A&E
  • Pat Greenland, associate producer

A police detective investigates suspicious deaths in the fictional English county of Midsomer. Based on the crime novels by Caroline Graham.
